|brand = Broadcom |model = BCM943241 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = NG1630 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = April 6, 2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Broadcom_BCM943241NG1630 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = SDIO |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = M.2 (NGFF) |formfactor = 1630
|vendor_id = 02d0 |device_id = 4324 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = QDS-BRCM1073,AK8SVD132A14L |icid = 4323A-BRCM1073 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43241;BCM43241XKFFBG; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = M.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = reference design |fccapprovdate = 04/05/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Device used in '''Sony Vaio Duo 13"''', FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/AK8/SVD132A14L AK8SVD132A14L] :The WiFi IC used is shown as being a [[Broadcom]] BCM43241XKFFBG. :This device is presumed to use M.FL connectors based on their appearance..
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://applelife.ru/threads/wi-fi-moduli-v-formate-pci-express-m-2-ngff.41926/ On '''AppleLife''' forums] :Device is NGFF Type 1630, key E :Wi-Fi used SDIO bus. SDIO ID: SD\VID_02D0&PID_4324&FN_1 :SDIO_02d0_4324 v3.7 (2012-12-11) :Bluetooth used PCM/UART bus. Bluetooth ID: ACPI\BCM2E47
